page.title: 18Malpas Area Shops
page.content: The Malpas area supports a large number of{shops.}There are no fewer than five shopping areas of more than five shops. These range from the largest and oldest concentration near Crindau to the new{purpose-built}units serving both private and council housing estates. Out of a total of 79 shops, 25 were {food shops}although we found many{ {Newsagents}and{garages}selling food. Trade in many of the food shops in the Crindau area seems to have suffered since a large{superstore} opened nearby. { Non-food}shops totalled 26 while the remainder consisted of {Post Offices,} {Newsagents,Betting Shops,Garages}and{ {Public Houses.}We found only 8 public houses in the area but there were 12 shops with {off-licences.}
